title: Creating an Inequality
text: First, we must transfer the word problen into an inequality that represents the maximum number of people that can ride in the elvator safely.

title: Creating an Inequality
text: Since we know that the maximum weight one elevator can support is 2,100 pounds and that the average weight of one person is $$150$$ pounds, we can let $$n$$ equal the number of people in the elevator and create the following inequality: $$150n \leq 2100$$.

title: Solving the Inequality
text: Now, we must isolate $$n$$ so that we are able to calculate its value.

title: Solving the Inequality
text: To isolate $$n$$, we must divide both sides by $$150$$. We now have $$n \leq 14$$.

title: Creating a Sentence-Answer
text: Since $$n$$ must be less than or equal to $$14$$, what is the maximum number of people the elevator can safely support?
